Package util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BBAdapter
    A tool that converts BBcode text to html text
    CourseInfo
    Bean class that holds a row of CourseInfo in the database It contains only getters and setters
    CourseSelect
    Course Selection class.
    CourseTable
    Helper class that helps to print a table about courses
    CourseTime
    A wrapper class around a course time.
    CsProfessorSpider  
    DateTimePrint
    to print a time if this time is today we print the time without date otherwise we print only the date
    DBFileGetter
    Servlet implementation class DBFileGetter This servlet only accepts get request parameter: id: the file id to get.
    DiscussionInfo
    the data of a topic is recorded in this class it is in accordance with the table "discussion" in the database
    DiscussionReplyInfo
    the data of a topic-reply is recorded in this class it is in accordance with the table "discussReply" in the database
    MailUtil
    A wrapper using predefined account
    MD5Tool
    A class that could turn string into MD5-hashed hex String
    ProfessorInfo  
    PublicInfo
    A Bean class that holds a row of PublicInfo table
    SlideNews
    A Bean class that holds a row of SlideNews table
    StudentChooseCourse
